title: Why is Blood Moon Thresh Unavailable?
body:
I would like to purchase this skin, but I seems to be unavailable. I cant seem to find any reasons to why its unavailable anywhere.

 Thanks,

replies.body:
Not released yet.

It's still an "Upcoming skin" even though it's already in the game file.
This. Only time period we have been told is patch 4.21, until the skin is released we wont know exactly when in 4.21 though.
It's not. It shows up on the champion page for Thresh but it's currently unavailable and not actually in the in-client store yet.
